name: Gem chaos
description:
Gem chaos is a small puzzle game made in 7 days for Brackeys game jam 2021.2. In the game, your goal is to escape the dungeon with a lot of gems and see the light of the outside world. Players will see a lot of types of gems that do different things so it is very chaotic. There are 7 types of gems: 

  • Red gem
  • Blue gem
  • Orange gem
  • Yellow gem
  • Green gem
  • Fake red gem
  • Fake yellow gem

Think OUTSIDE the box when solving puzzles.

Programs/sites that were used for making the game: Unity(game engine), GIMP(art), jsfxr(sound effects), BeepBox(music). 

The Windows version is not tested yet but the mac version is.

Have fun playing the game!
